Dapitan.title: Dapitan
Dapitan.byline: Dapitan, also known as the Shrine City of the Philippines, is a city in the province of Zamboanga del Norte, located on the island of Mindanao, which is the second largest island in the Philippines.

Dapoli.title: Dapoli
Dapoli.byline: Dapoli is popular beach destination in the South Konkan region of Maharashtra.
